headline: Down 54%, Can This Growth Stock Soar Over the Next 3 Years?
summary: Lululemon used to post strong double-digit percentage revenue growth like clockwork, but that favorable streak has come to an end.  Investor sentiment appears to be broadly improving since President Donald Trump dialed down some of his threatened tariffs for the time being.  As of June 24, this growth stock is trading 54% below the peak it touched in December 2023.

headline: Stocks to Watch Friday: Nike, JPMorgan, Xiaomi, MP Materials
summary: ↗️ Nike (NKE): The sportswear company said it expects tariffs to raise its annual costs by $1 billion this fiscal year. Shares jumped 10% in premarket trading, however, as its quarterly earnings and sales topped expectations.
